com.percussion.cms.objectstore
Class PSFolderAcl

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSDbComponent
      com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSDbComponentSet
          com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSObjectAcl
              com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSFolderAcl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSCmsComponent, IPSDbComponent, Cloneable
public class PSFolderAcl
extends PSObjectAcl

This class represents a PSObjectAcl for a folder. It is used when restoring a folder's acl from the database without the context of the enclosing folder object, so that it may provide any folder level information required for calculating security permissions at runtime.

PSFolderAcl

public PSFolderAcl(int contentId,
                   int communityId)
The default constructor to create an empty folder ACL.

Parameters:
contentId - The id of the folder for which this ACL defines security settings.
communityId - The community id of the folder for which this ACL defines security settings.

fromXml

public void fromXml(Element src)
             throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Constructs this object from the supplied element. The xml format is that expected by PSXObjectAcl.fromXml() with additional "contentid" and "communityId" attributes set on the root element.

Specified by:

Specified by:

toXml

public Element toXml(Document doc)
Description copied from class: PSObjectAcl
Produce XML representation of this object. The xml format is:

<!ELEMENT PSXObjectAcl (PSXObjectAclEntry+)>

See PSObjectAclEntry.toXml(Document) for the DTD of PSXObjectAclEntry element.

Specified by:
toXml in interface IPSCmsComponent
Overrides:
toXml in class PSObjectAcl
Parameters:
doc - the Xml document to use for creating elements, may not be null
Returns:
the element containing the Xml representation of this object, never null.

getCommunityId

public int getCommunityId()
Get the community id of the folder for which this ACL defines security settings.

Returns:
The community id, or -1 if the folder is accessable by all communities.

getContentId

public int getContentId()
Get the id of the folder for which this ACL defines security settings.

Returns:
The id.
